results.context: <input type="text" id="searchbox_text" value="search this site" onclick="document.getElementById('searchbox_text').value = ''" name="q" size="10">
results.message: This text input element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title attribute, aria-label attribute, aria-labelledby attribute.

results.context: <input type="text" id="searchbox_text" value="search this site" onclick="document.getElementById('searchbox_text').value = ''" name="q" size="10">
